item.title: Engine::Audio
item.description: Engine::Audio # Classes # Name class Engine::Audio::AudioBuffer A simple audio buffer to hold PCM samples class Engine::Audio::AudioManager An audio manager that accepts multiple Audio::AudioBuffer instances. Types Documentation # typedef Callback # typedef int(* Engine::Audio::Callback) (AudioBuffer &buffer, size_t offset); Some callback function pointer type definition.
